summary: I aim to make the girls of Skyrim better looking!
descriptionHtml:
**Description**

So this mod is for people who wants their Skyrim to be 20% cooler. And if you don\'t want to vomit every time you turn on Skyrim and see an ugly girl.

**Requirements**

Apachii\'s ApachiiSkyHair is just awesome... and you need it ;) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/

Newermind43\'s Hair Pack. Simple name, but amazing and is required.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3809


BellaGail\'s Better Females
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812/

Caliente\'s Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- (For TextBlend actually)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/

**Installation**

Easy way:
1. Download with NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) 
2. Activate the mod in the Manager

3. ***RUN TexBlend in >Data>Options>TexBlend (You\'ll get this when you have installed CBBE)***

4. Open Skyrim Laucher and activate all the plugins
5. Endorse if you like it <3

Hard way: 
1. Download the mod, and open it in any program that can handle .zip files. (7zip, WinRar...)
2. Extract the files
3. Place the folder \"Data\" that you just exstracted into >Steam>SteamApps>common>Skyrim
4. Activate the .esp file in Skyrim Launcher

NPCs that are modded. For now..

**Changelog**

V0.2 
*Merged all the .ESP files into one single .ESP*
*Unpacked all the .BSA files*

If you find any bugs, or anything you want to tell me, please do!

Thank you.
author: Meberg
